name: Prayer to Otter
description: <c=@flavor>Otter is a fickle spirit, but when she does grant a boon, it is a powerful gift indeed.</c>

name: Amulet of the Skies
description: <c=@flavor>A talented Durmand Priory scholar based this necklace on ancient astrological charts found on jotun megaliths.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>Part of the ancient karka that attacked Lion's Arch. Mysterious magics seem to be woven into its chitinous shell.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>Legends speak of "Big Mama," the largest drake broodmother that ever lived. If she still does, it seems she's short at least one tooth.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>An extremely rare and powerful floral specimen.</c>
